overview:
A Norwegian entrepreneur currently based in Cologne (DE), Vidar has been making software suck less since 1997; for governments, national companies and global corporations.

Currently, Vidar is the co-founder of the bootstrapped EU based startup Gauss - The People Magnet.

He co-founder the Plone content management system currently in use by e.g. the FBI, the CIA, the government of Brazil, Yale University and many more in and around 2000.

In 1997 Vidar founded blacktar.com, a company dedicated to making web-based software work for people and not the other way around.
